title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Officially Reveals Nickelodeon Collaboration - Nintendo Life
summary: Sega confirms SpongeBob SquarePants and other Nickelodeon characters will join Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds following earlier leaks.
why_matters: This collaboration between Sega and Nickelodeon expands the Sonic Racing universe, appealing to fans of both franchises and potentially increasing the game's popularity.
